# ML Operations at Scale

::: {.callout-note title="Volume II: Advanced ML Systems"}
This chapter is part of Volume II, currently under development. Check back for updates.
:::

## Overview

Building on the MLOps fundamentals covered in Volume I, this chapter explores the challenges and solutions for operating ML systems at scale across large organizations and distributed infrastructure.

## Topics Covered

- **Platform Engineering**: Building reusable ML infrastructure for teams
- **Multi-Model Management**: Serving hundreds of models efficiently
- **ML Infrastructure as Code**: Declarative pipelines and reproducible environments
- **Organizational Patterns**: Team structures and workflows for ML at scale
- **Production Debugging**: Systematic approaches to debugging distributed ML systems
